text: Jim Arthur (born July 12, 1978) is the current assistant strength and conditioning coach for the Miami Dolphins of the National Football League. ==Coaching career== Arthur began his coaching career as a student assistant at Springfield College. He was an intern coach for the Buffalo Bills, before joining the Chicago Bears as the assistant strength and conditioning coach under Rusty Jones in 2006.Chicago Bears Arthur followed offensive coordinator Adam Gase to the Miami Dolphins in 2016. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Chicago Bears coaches Category:Miami Dolphins coaches Category:1978 births
title: Jim Arthur
